titleStmt.title: To the right honorable the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament the humble petition and remonstrance of the nobility and gentry of the county of Yorke.

publicationStmt.publisher: First printed at Yorke, and now reprinted at London for William Smith,

notesStmt.note: Desiring to know whether John Hotham's proceedings have the authority of the Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
